data.eml:eml: Neotype designation and redescription of Inostemma indicum (Platygastroidea: Platygastridae) parasitizing ivy gourd gall midge

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamalanathan, Veenakumari, Shylesha, A. N., Mohanraj, Prashanth (2018): Neotype designation and redescription of Inostemma indicum (Platygastroidea: Platygastridae) parasitizing ivy gourd gall midge. Zootaxa 4420 (3): 439-444, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4420.3.9
